title: Aa the autoattacker (new champ idea)
body:
I tried to make this less OP because you guys said my last 2 champ ideas were quite strong picks

passive: Aa starts the game with 200 more gold but has no base AD
Q: cd: 7, mana: 45/55/65/75/85. Aa's next autoattack deals 10/20/30/40/50+10% AD extra damage
W: cd: 9, mana: 60. Aa's next autoattack slows both Aa and the enemy for 35/40/45/50/55%
E: cd: 14/13/12/11/10, mana: 115. Aa's next autoattack deals 30+6/8/10/12/14% AP extra damage
R: cd: 140/120/90, mana: 100. Aa gains 20/30/40% attack speed and each autoattack deals 105/110/115% AD damage for 3 seconds
